title: Emilia Clarke pretty in purple sequin number with Henry Golding at Last Christmas premiere
text:
Emilia Clarke and Henry Golding are all smiles as they hit the red carpet at the Last Christmas premiere in New York City on Tuesday night.

The 30 year old actress and her 32 year old co-star posed together at the red carpet event, held at the AMC Lincoln Square in Manhattan.

Clarke and Golding also posed alongside their director, Paul Feig, along with co-star Michelle Yeoh and Golding's wife Liv Lo.

Emilia and Henry: Emilia Clarke and Henry Golding are all smiles as they hit the red carpet at the Last Christmas premiere in New York City on Tuesday night

Red carpet: The 30 year old actress and her 32 year old co-star posed together at the red carpet event, held at the AMC Lincoln Square in Manhattan

Team: Clarke and Golding also posed alongside their director, Paul Feig, along with co-star Michelle Yeoh and Golding's wife Liv Lo

Clarke was wearing a dazzling purple dress with matching dazzling earrings for her red carpet appearance.

She wore her brunette hair down to the premiere, parted down the middle as she walked the red carpet.

She completed her look with matching heels as she posed with co-stars and her director.

Emilia's look: Clarke was wearing a dazzling purple dress with matching dazzling earrings for her red carpet appearance

New look: She wore her brunette hair down to the premiere, parted down the middle as she walked the red carpet

Her co-star Golding was wearing a grey-on-grey suit with a matching suit coat, dress shirt, tie and even matching socks.

He completed his look with a pair of brown suede loafers for his red carpet appearance.

Last Christmas is slated to hit theaters November 8, going up against several movies in wide release including Doctor Sleep, Playing With Fire, Midway and Better Days.

Last Christmas team: Her co-star Golding was wearing a grey-on-grey suit with a matching suit coat, dress shirt, tie and even matching socks

Coming soon: Last Christmas is slated to hit theaters November 8, going up against several movies in wide release including Doctor Sleep, Playing With Fire, Midway and Better Days

The movie follow Kate (Clarke), a downtrodden woman who is prone to making bad decisions, who takes a job as a department store elf over Christmas.

During her time at the store, she meets Tom (Golding), and her life starts to take a turn for the better.

Emma Thompson stars as Adelia, and she also co-wrote the screenplay with Bryonny Kimmings.

New movie: The movie follow Kate (Clarke), a downtrodden woman who is prone to making bad decisions, who takes a job as a department store elf over Christmas

Taking a turn: During her time at the store, she meets Tom (Golding), and her life starts to take a turn for the better

Clarke also stars in the upcoming movie Above Suspicion, alongside Jack Huston and Thora Birch, which doesn't have a release date.

Golding made his feature film debut in last year's breakthrough hit Crazy Rich Asians, and he also starred in A Simple Favor.

He'll next be seen in director Guy Ritchie's The Gentlemen, in theaters January 24, 2020 and playing the title character in the G.I. Joe spin-off Snake Eyes.

Coming soon: Clarke also stars in the upcoming movie Above Suspicion, alongside Jack Huston and Thora Birch, which doesn't have a release date

Breakthrough: Golding made his feature film debut in last year's breakthrough hit Crazy Rich Asians, and he also starred in A Simple Favor

Paul and Laurie: Director Paul Feig poses with his wife Laurie

Red carpet kiss: Paul Feig gives his wife Laurie a kiss on the red carpet

Reunited: Henry Golding reunites with his Crazy Rich Asians co-star Michelle Yeoh

Michelle: Michelle Yeoh is all smiles on the red carpet

Melissa: The Real Housewives of New Jersey star Melissa Gorga hits the red carpet

Henry and Liv: Henry Golding hits the red carpet with wife Liv Lo
description: Emilia Clarke and Henry Golding are all smiles as they hit the red carpet at the Last Christmas premiere in New York City on Tuesday night.
